row.Docu:
Name: /registry/key Type: String Description: Prompt set for registry key. Ex: HKLM\Software\UC4
Name: /registry/optional/key_value Type: String Description: Value name under the key to add.
Name: /registry/optional/default_key_value Type: Boolean Description: Add empty value name (Default) under the key
Name: /registry/optional/use_separator Type: String Description: Specify one character that you use as the separator in your data string for REG_MULTI_SZ. If omitted, use "\0" as the separator.
